About.title: About Me
About.subtitle: What I do
description: Iâ€™m Talha Jamil, a Fullstack Developer who loves crafting digital experiences that feel smooth, modern, and engaging.
From sleek web platforms with React, Next.js, and TailwindCSS to powerful mobile apps with React Native, I bring ideas to life with clean code and creative design.
On the backend, I use Node.js, Supabase, and APIs to build secure, scalable, and reliable systems.
Blending UI/UX design thinking with performance-focused development, I make products that not only look great but also work flawlessly.
I enjoy turning complex ideas into simple, intuitive solutions that deliver real value.
If youâ€™re looking for someone who can handle the entire stack while keeping users at the center, Iâ€™m ready to collaborate.
